2022.journals_title: ACM Transactions on Privacy and Security, Volume 25

papers.title: C3PO: Cloud-based Confidentiality-preserving Continuous Query Processing
papers.authors: Savvas Savvides, Seema Kumar, Julian James Stephen, Patrick Eugster
papers.abstract:
With the advent of the Internet of things (IoT), billions of devices are expected to continuously collect and process sensitive data (e.g., location, personal health factors). Due to the limited computational capacity available on IoT devices, the current de facto model for building IoT applications is to send the gathered data to the cloud for computation. While building private cloud infrastructures for handling large amounts of data streams can be expensive, using low-cost public (untrusted) cloud infrastructures for processing continuous queries including sensitive data leads to strong concerns over data confidentiality.
 This article presents C3PO, a confidentiality-preserving, continuous query processing engine, that leverages the public cloud. The key idea is to intelligently utilize partially homomorphic and property-preserving encryption to perform as many computationally intensive operations as possible—without revealing plaintext—in the untrusted cloud. C3PO provides simple abstractions to the developer to hide the complexities of applying complex cryptographic primitives, reasoning about the performance of such primitives, deciding which computations can be executed in an untrusted tier, and optimizing cloud resource usage. An empirical evaluation with several benchmarks and case studies shows the feasibility of our approach. We consider different classes of IoT devices that differ in their computational and memory resources (from a Raspberry Pi 3 to a very small device with a Cortex-M3 microprocessor) and through the use of optimizations, we demonstrate the feasibility of using partially homomorphic and property-preserving encryption on IoT devices.
papers.abstract_zh:
随着物联网(IoT)的出现，预计将有数十亿台设备持续收集和处理敏感数据(例如，位置、个人健康因素)。由于物联网设备上可用的计算能力有限，当前构建物联网应用程序的实际模型是将收集的数据发送到云中进行计算。虽然构建用于处理大量数据流的私有云基础架构可能非常昂贵，但使用低成本的公共(不可信)云基础架构来处理包括敏感数据在内的连续查询会导致对数据机密性的强烈担忧。
本文介绍C3PO，这是一个保持机密性的连续查询处理引擎，它利用了公共云。关键思想是智能地利用部分同态和属性保持加密来在不可信云中执行尽可能多的计算密集型操作，而不会暴露明文。C3PO为开发人员提供了简单的抽象，以隐藏应用复杂加密原语、推理此类原语的性能、决定哪些计算可以在不受信任的层中执行以及优化云资源使用的复杂性。通过几个基准测试和案例分析，验证了该方法的可行性。我们考虑了不同类别的物联网设备，这些设备在计算和内存资源方面有所不同(从Raspberry Pi 3到带有Cortex-M3微处理器的非常小的设备)，通过使用优化，我们证明了在物联网设备上使用部分同态和属性保持加密的可行性。
papers.title_zh: C3PO:基于云的保持机密性的连续查询处理

papers.title: Formal Modelling and Automated Trade-off Analysis of Enforcement Architectures for Cryptographic Access Control in the Cloud
papers.authors: Stefano Berlato, Roberto Carbone, Adam J. Lee, Silvio Ranise
papers.abstract:
To facilitate the adoption of cloud by organizations, Cryptographic Access Control (CAC) is the obvious solution to control data sharing among users while preventing partially trusted Cloud Service Providers (CSP) from accessing sensitive data. Indeed, several CAC schemes have been proposed in the literature. Despite their differences, available solutions are based on a common set of entities—e.g., a data storage service or a proxy mediating the access of users to encrypted data—that operate in different (security) domains—e.g., on-premise or the CSP. However, the majority of these CAC schemes assumes a fixed assignment of entities to domains; this has security and usability implications that are not made explicit and can make inappropriate the use of a CAC scheme in certain scenarios with specific trust assumptions and requirements. For instance, assuming that the proxy runs at the premises of the organization avoids the vendor lock-in effect but may give rise to other security concerns (e.g., malicious insiders attackers).
 To the best of our knowledge, no previous work considers how to select the best possible architecture (i.e., the assignment of entities to domains) to deploy a CAC scheme for the trust assumptions and requirements of a given scenario. In this article, we propose a methodology to assist administrators in exploring different architectures for the enforcement of CAC schemes in a given scenario. We do this by identifying the possible architectures underlying the CAC schemes available in the literature and formalizing them in simple set theory. This allows us to reduce the problem of selecting the most suitable architectures satisfying a heterogeneous set of trust assumptions and requirements arising from the considered scenario to a decidable Multi-objective Combinatorial Optimization Problem (MOCOP) for which state-of-the-art solvers can be invoked. Finally, we show how we use the capability of solving the MOCOP to build a prototype tool assisting administrators to preliminarily perform a “What-if” analysis to explore the trade-offs among the various architectures and then use available standards and tools (such as TOSCA and Cloudify) for automated deployment in multiple CSPs.
papers.abstract_zh:
为了促进组织采用云，加密访问控制(CAC)是控制用户之间数据共享的显而易见的解决方案，同时防止部分受信任的云服务提供商(CSP)访问敏感数据。实际上，文献中已经提出了几种CAC方案。尽管存在差异，但可用的解决方案都基于一组通用的实体，例如数据存储服务或中介用户访问加密数据的代理，它们在不同的(安全)域中运行，例如内部部署或CSP。然而，这些CAC方案中的大多数假定实体到域的固定分配；这具有不明确的安全性和可用性含义，并且可能在具有特定信任假设和要求的特定场景中不恰当地使用CAC方案。例如，假设代理在组织的前提下运行可以避免供应商锁定效应，但可能会引起其他安全问题(例如，恶意的内部攻击者)。
据我们所知，没有先前的工作考虑如何选择最佳可能的架构(即，实体到域的分配)来为给定场景的信任假设和要求部署CAC方案。在本文中，我们提出了一种方法来帮助管理员探索在给定场景中实施CAC方案的不同体系结构。我们通过识别文献中可用的CAC方案的潜在可能架构，并用简单集合论对它们进行形式化来做到这一点。这使得我们可以将选择最合适的体系结构来满足由所考虑的场景产生的一组不同的信任假设和需求的问题简化为可判定的多目标组合优化问题(MOCOP ),对于该问题可以调用最先进的求解器。最后，我们展示了如何使用解决MOCOP的能力来构建一个原型工具，帮助管理员初步执行“假设”分析，以探索各种架构之间的权衡，然后使用可用的标准和工具(如TOSCA和Cloudify)在多个CSP中进行自动部署。
papers.title_zh: 云中加密访问控制实施架构的形式化建模和自动权衡分析

papers.title: Vulnerabilities of Unattended Face Verification Systems to Facial Components-based Presentation Attacks: An Empirical Study
papers.authors: Le Qin, Fei Peng, Min Long, Raghavendra Ramachandra, Christoph Busch
papers.abstract: As face presentation attacks (PAs) are realistic threats for unattended face verification systems, face presentation attack detection (PAD) has been intensively investigated in past years, and the recent advances in face PAD have significantly reduced the success rate of such attacks. In this article, an empirical study on a novel and effective face impostor PA is made. In the proposed PA, a facial artifact is created by using the most vulnerable facial components, which are optimally selected based on the vulnerability analysis of different facial components to impostor PAs. An attacker can launch a face PA by presenting a facial artifact on his or her own real face. With a collected PA database containing various types of artifacts and presentation attack instruments (PAIs), the experimental results and analysis show that the proposed PA poses a more serious threat to face verification and PAD systems compared with the print, replay, and mask PAs. Moreover, the generalization ability of the proposed PA and the vulnerability analysis with regard to commercial systems are also investigated by evaluating unknown face verification and real-world PAD systems. It provides a new paradigm for the study of face PAs.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于人脸呈现攻击(PAs)是无人值守人脸验证系统的现实威胁，人脸呈现攻击检测(PAD)在过去几年中得到了深入研究，并且人脸PAD的最新进展显著降低了此类攻击的成功率。本文对一种新颖有效的人脸冒充器PA进行了实验研究。在所提出的PA中，通过使用最脆弱的面部成分来创建面部伪影，这些面部成分是基于不同面部成分对冒名顶替者PA的脆弱性分析而优化选择的。攻击者可以通过在他或她自己的真实面部上呈现面部伪影来启动面部PA。通过收集包含各种类型的伪像和呈现攻击工具(pai)的PA数据库，实验结果和分析表明，与打印、重放和屏蔽PA相比，所提出的PA对人脸验证和PAD系统构成了更严重的威胁。此外，还通过评估未知人脸验证和真实世界PAD系统，研究了所提出的PA的泛化能力和关于商业系统的脆弱性分析。它为人脸表情符号的研究提供了一个新的范式。
papers.title_zh: 无人值守人脸验证系统对基于人脸部件的呈现攻击的脆弱性:一项实证研究

papers.title: A Novel Hybrid Approach for Multi-Dimensional Data Anonymization for Apache Spark
papers.authors: Sibghat Ullah Bazai, Julian Jang-Jaccard, Hooman Alavizadeh
papers.abstract: Multi-dimensional data anonymization approaches (e.g., Mondrian) ensure more fine-grained data privacy by providing a different anonymization strategy applied for each attribute. Many variations of multi-dimensional anonymization have been implemented on different distributed processing platforms (e.g., MapReduce, Spark) to take advantage of their scalability and parallelism supports. According to our critical analysis on overheads, either existing iteration-based or recursion-based approaches do not provide effective mechanisms for creating the optimal number of and relative size of resilient distributed datasets (RDDs), thus heavily suffer from performance overheads. To solve this issue, we propose a novel hybrid approach for effectively implementing a multi-dimensional data anonymization strategy (e.g., Mondrian) that is scalable and provides high-performance. Our hybrid approach provides a mechanism to create far fewer RDDs and smaller size partitions attached to each RDD than existing approaches. This optimal RDD creation and operations approach is critical for many multi-dimensional data anonymization applications that create tremendous execution complexity. The new mechanism in our proposed hybrid approach can dramatically reduce the critical overheads involved in re-computation cost, shuffle operations, message exchange, and cache management.
papers.abstract_zh: 多维数据匿名化方法(例如，Mondrian)通过为每个属性提供不同的匿名化策略来确保更细粒度的数据隐私。多维匿名化的许多变体已经在不同的分布式处理平台(例如MapReduce、Spark)上实现，以利用它们的可扩展性和并行性支持。根据我们对开销的关键分析，现有的基于迭代或基于递归的方法都没有提供有效的机制来创建弹性分布式数据集(rdd)的最佳数量和相对大小，因此受到性能开销的严重影响。为了解决这个问题，我们提出了一种新的混合方法，用于有效地实现多维数据匿名化策略(例如，Mondrian ),该策略是可扩展的并且提供高性能。我们的混合方法提供了一种机制，与现有的方法相比，它可以为每个RDD创建更少的rdd和更小的分区。这种最佳的RDD创建和操作方法对于许多多维数据匿名化应用程序至关重要，这些应用程序会产生巨大的执行复杂性。我们提出的混合方法中的新机制可以显著减少重新计算成本、混洗操作、消息交换和缓存管理中涉及的关键开销。
papers.title_zh: 面向Apache Spark的多维数据匿名混合方法

papers.title: AutoProfile: Towards Automated Profile Generation for Memory Analysis
papers.authors: Fabio Pagani, Davide Balzarotti
papers.abstract:
Despite a considerable number of approaches that have been proposed to protect computer systems, cyber-criminal activities are on the rise and forensic analysis of compromised machines and seized devices is becoming essential in computer security.
 
 This article focuses on memory forensics, a branch of digital forensics that extract artifacts from the volatile memory. In particular, this article looks at a key ingredient required by memory forensics frameworks: a precise model of the OS kernel under analysis, also known as
 profile
 . By using the information stored in the profile, memory forensics tools are able to
 bridge the semantic gap
 and interpret raw bytes to extract evidences from a memory dump.
 
 
 A big problem with profile-based solutions is that custom profiles must be created for each and every system under analysis. This is especially problematic for Linux systems, because profiles are not
 generic
 : they are strictly tied to a specific kernel version and to the configuration used to build the kernel. Failing to create a valid profile means that an analyst cannot unleash the true power of memory forensics and is limited to primitive carving strategies.
 
 
 For this reason, in this article we present a novel approach that combines source code and binary analysis techniques to automatically generate a profile from a memory dump,
 without
 relying on any non-public information. Our experiments show that this is a viable solution and that profiles reconstructed by our framework can be used to run many plugins, which are essential for a successful forensics investigation.
papers.abstract_zh:
尽管已经提出了相当多的方法来保护计算机系统，但是网络犯罪活动正在增加，并且对受损机器和被没收设备的取证分析在计算机安全中变得至关重要。

本文关注内存取证，这是数字取证的一个分支，它从易失性内存中提取工件。特别是，本文着眼于内存取证框架所需的一个关键要素:被分析的操作系统内核的精确模型，也称为
轮廓
。通过使用存储在配置文件中的信息，内存取证工具能够
弥合语义鸿沟
并解释原始字节以从存储器转储中提取证据。


基于概要文件的解决方案的一个大问题是，必须为每个被分析的系统创建定制的概要文件。这对于Linux系统来说尤其成问题，因为概要文件不是
一般的
:它们严格依赖于特定的内核版本和用于构建内核的配置。无法创建有效的配置文件意味着分析师无法释放内存取证的真正力量，并且仅限于原始的雕刻策略。


因此，在本文中，我们提出了一种结合源代码和二进制分析技术的新方法，
没有
依赖任何非公开信息。我们的实验表明，这是一个可行的解决方案，由我们的框架重建的配置文件可以用于运行许多插件，这对成功的取证调查是必不可少的。
papers.title_zh: AutoProfile:面向内存分析的自动概要生成

papers.title: Secure Selections on Encrypted Multi-writer Streams
papers.authors: Angelo Massimo Perillo, Giuseppe Persiano, Alberto Trombetta
papers.abstract:
Performing searches over encrypted data is a very current and active area. Several efficient solutions have been provided for the
 single-writer
 scenario in which all sensitive data originate with one party (the
 Data Owner
 ) that encrypts and uploads the data to a public repository. Subsequently, the Data Owner accesses the encrypted data through a
 Query Processor
 , which has direct access to the public encrypted repository. Motivated by the recent trend in pervasive data collection, we depart from this model and consider a
 multi-writer
 scenario in which the data originate with several and mutually untrusted parties, the
 Data Sources
 . In this new scenario, the Data Owner provides public parameters so that each Data Source can add encrypted items to the public encrypted stream; moreover, the Data Owner keeps some related secret information needed to generate
 tokens
 so that different
 Query Sources
 can decrypt different subsets of the encrypted stream, as specified by corresponding access policies.
 
 
 We propose security model for this problem that we call
 Secure Selective Stream
 (
 SSS
 ) and give a secure construction for it based on hard problems in Pairing-Based Cryptography. The cryptographic core of our construction is a new primitive,
 Amortized Orthogonality Encryption
 , that is crucial for the efficiency of the proposed implementation for
 SSS
 .
papers.abstract_zh:
对加密数据进行搜索是一个非常流行和活跃的领域。已经为提供了几种有效的解决方案
单一作者
所有敏感数据都来自一方(即
数据所有者
)加密并将数据上传到公共存储库。随后，数据所有者通过
询问处理程序
，它可以直接访问公共加密存储库。受最近普遍的数据收集趋势的推动，我们从这个模型出发，考虑一个
多作者
数据来自几个相互不信任的方的场景
数据源
。在这个新场景中，数据所有者提供公共参数，以便每个数据源可以向公共加密流添加加密项；此外，数据所有者保留一些生成所需的相关机密信息
代币
所以不同的是
查询来源
可以解密由相应的访问策略指定的加密流的不同子集。


我们针对这个问题提出了安全模型，我们称之为
安全选择流
（
选征兵役制（SelectiveServiceSystem）
)并基于对密码学中的难题给出了一个安全的构造。我们构造的密码核心是一个新的原语，
摊销正交加密
，这对建议的实施效率至关重要
选征兵役制（SelectiveServiceSystem）
。
papers.title_zh: 加密多写者流上的安全选择

papers.title: MOTION - A Framework for Mixed-Protocol Multi-Party Computation
papers.authors: Lennart Braun, Daniel Demmler, Thomas Schneider, Oleksandr Tkachenko
papers.abstract: We present MOTION, an efficient and generic open-source framework for mixed-protocol secure multi-party computation (MPC). MOTION is built in a user-friendly, modular, and extensible way, intended to be used as a tool in MPC research and to increase adoption of MPC protocols in practice. Our framework incorporates several important engineering decisions such as full communication serialization, which enables MPC over arbitrary messaging interfaces and removes the need of owning network sockets. MOTION also incorporates several performance optimizations that improve the communication complexity and latency, e.g., \( 2\times \) better online round complexity of precomputed correlated Oblivious Transfer (OT). We instantiate our framework with protocols for N parties and security against up to \( N-1 \) passive corruptions: the MPC protocols of Goldreich-Micali-Wigderson (GMW) in its arithmetic and Boolean version and OT-based BMR (Ben-Efraim et al., CCS’16), as well as novel and highly efficient conversions between them, including a non-interactive conversion from BMR to arithmetic GMW. MOTION is highly efficient, which we demonstrate in our experiments. Compared to secure evaluation of AES-128 with \( N=3 \) parties in a high-latency network with OT-based BMR, we achieve a 16 \( \times \) better throughput of 16 AES evaluations per second using BMR. With this, we show that BMR is much more competitive than previously assumed. For \( N=3 \) parties and full-threshold protocols in a LAN, MOTION is \( 10\times \) – \( 18\times \) faster than the previous best passively secure implementation from the MP-SPDZ framework, and \( 190\times \) – \( 586\times \) faster than the actively secure SCALE-MAMBA framework. Finally, we show that our framework is highly efficient for privacy-preserving neural network inference.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了MOTION，一个有效的通用开源框架，用于混合协议安全多方计算(MPC)。MOTION以用户友好、模块化和可扩展的方式构建，旨在用作MPC研究中的工具，并在实践中增加MPC协议的采用。我们的框架包含了几个重要的工程决策，比如全通信序列化，它支持任意消息接口上的MPC，并且消除了拥有网络套接字的需要。MOTION还整合了多项性能优化，改善了通信复杂性和延迟，例如，预计算相关不经意传输(OT)的在线循环复杂性提高了(2倍)。我们用针对N方的协议和针对高达\( N-1 \)被动破坏的安全性来实例化我们的框架:Goldreich-Micali-Wigderson (GMW)的MPC协议的算术和布尔版本，以及基于OT的BMR (Ben-Efraim等人，CCS'16)，以及它们之间新颖和高效的转换，包括从BMR到算术GMW的非交互式转换。我们在实验中证明了运动的高效率。与在基于OT的BMR的高延迟网络中使用(N=3)方对AES-128进行安全评估相比，使用BMR，我们每秒16次AES评估的吞吐量提高了16倍。由此，我们证明BMR比之前假设的更有竞争力。对于局域网中的\( N=3 \)个用户和全门限协议，MOTION比MP-SPDZ框架中以前最好的被动安全实现快\( 10倍\)-18倍\，比主动安全SCALE-MAMBA框架快\( 190倍\)-586倍\。最后，我们证明了我们的框架对于隐私保护神经网络推理是高效的。
papers.title_zh: MOTION——混合协议多方计算框架

papers.title: Terminator: A Secure Coprocessor to Accelerate Real-Time AntiViruses Using Inspection Breakpoints
papers.authors: Marcus Botacin, Francis B. Moreira, Philippe O. A. Navaux, André Grégio, Marco A. Z. Alves
papers.abstract: AntiViruses (AVs) are essential to face the myriad of malware threatening Internet users. AVs operate in two modes: on-demand checks and real-time verification. Software-based real-time AVs intercept system and function calls to execute AV’s inspection routines, resulting in significant performance penalties as the monitoring code runs among the suspicious code. Simultaneously, dark silicon problems push the industry to add more specialized accelerators inside the processor to mitigate these integration problems. In this article, we propose Terminator, an AV-specific coprocessor to assist software AVs by outsourcing their matching procedures to the hardware, thus saving CPU cycles and mitigating performance degradation. We designed Terminator to be flexible and compatible with existing AVs by using YARA and ClamAVrules. Our experiments show that our approach can save up to 70 million CPU cycles per rule when outsourcing on-demand checks for matching typical, unmodified YARA rules against a dataset of 30 thousand in-the-wild malware samples. Our proposal eliminates the AV’s need for blocking the CPU to perform full system checks, which can now occur in parallel. We also designed a new inspection breakpoint mechanism that signals to the coprocessor the beginning of a monitored region, allowing it to scan the regions in parallel with their execution. Overall, our mechanism mitigated up to 44% of the overhead imposed to execute and monitor the SPEC benchmark applications in the most challenging scenario.
papers.abstract_zh: 面对无数威胁互联网用户的恶意软件，反病毒软件是必不可少的。AVs以两种模式运行:按需检查和实时验证。基于软件的实时AVs拦截系统和函数调用，以执行AV的检查例程，由于监控代码在可疑代码中运行，导致显著的性能损失。同时，暗硅问题促使业界在处理器中添加更多专门的加速器来缓解这些集成问题。在本文中，我们提出了Terminator，一个AV专用的协处理器，通过将匹配过程外包给硬件来帮助软件AV，从而节省CPU周期并减轻性能下降。通过使用YARA和ClamAVrules，我们设计的Terminator非常灵活，可以兼容现有的AVs。我们的实验表明，当外包针对3万个野外恶意软件样本的数据集匹配典型的、未修改的YARA规则的按需检查时，我们的方法可以为每个规则节省多达7000万个CPU周期。我们的建议消除了AV阻塞CPU来执行全系统检查的需要，这种检查现在可以并行进行。我们还设计了一种新的检查断点机制，向协处理器发出被监控区域开始的信号，允许它在执行的同时扫描这些区域。总的来说，我们的机制在最具挑战性的场景中减少了高达44%的执行和监控SPEC基准应用程序的开销。
papers.title_zh: 终结器:一个安全的协处理器，使用检查断点加速实时抗病毒程序

papers.title: Constrained Proximity Attacks on Mobile Targets
papers.authors: Xueou Wang, Xiaolu Hou, Ruben Rios, Nils Ole Tippenhauer, Martín Ochoa
papers.abstract: Proximity attacks allow an adversary to uncover the location of a victim by repeatedly issuing queries with fake location data. These attacks have been mostly studied in scenarios where victims remain static and there are no constraints that limit the actions of the attacker. In such a setting, it is not difficult for the attacker to locate a particular victim and quantifying the effort for doing so is straightforward. However, it is far more realistic to consider scenarios where potential victims present a particular mobility pattern. In this article, we consider abstract (constrained and unconstrained) attacks on services that provide location information on other users in the proximity. We derive strategies for constrained and unconstrained attackers, and show that when unconstrained they can practically achieve success with theoretically optimal effort. We then propose a simple yet effective constraint that may be employed by a proximity service (for example, running in the cloud or using a suitable two-party protocol) as a countermeasure to increase the effort for the attacker several orders of magnitude both in simulated and real-world cases.
papers.abstract_zh: 邻近攻击允许对手通过重复发出带有虚假位置数据的查询来发现受害者的位置。这些攻击主要是在受害者保持静止并且没有限制攻击者行动的约束的场景中进行研究的。在这种情况下，攻击者定位特定的受害者并不困难，量化为此付出的努力也很简单。然而，考虑潜在受害者呈现特定移动模式的情景要现实得多。在本文中，我们考虑对提供附近其他用户位置信息的服务的抽象(约束和非约束)攻击。我们推导了受约束和不受约束的攻击者的策略，并表明当不受约束时，他们可以通过理论上的最优努力实际获得成功。然后，我们提出了一个简单而有效的约束，邻近服务(例如，运行在云中或使用合适的双方协议)可以将其作为一种对策，在模拟和真实世界的情况下，将攻击者的工作量增加几个数量级。
papers.title_zh: 对移动目标的受限邻近攻击

papers.title: So Near and Yet So Far - Symbolic Verification of Distance-Bounding Protocols
papers.authors: Alexandre Debant, Stéphanie Delaune, Cyrille Wiedling
papers.abstract: The continuous adoption of Near Field Communication (NFC) tags offers many new applications whose security is essential (e.g., contactless payments). In order to prevent flaws and attacks, we develop in this article a framework allowing us to analyse the underlying security protocols, taking into account the location of the agents and the transmission delay when exchanging messages. We propose two reduction results to render automatic verification possible relying on the existing verification tool ProVerif. Our first result allows one to consider a unique topology to catch all possible attacks. The second result simplifies the security analysis when considering Terrorist fraud. Then, based on these results, we perform a comprehensive case study analysis (27 protocols), in which we obtain new proofs of security for some protocols and detect attacks on some others.
papers.abstract_zh: 近场通信(NFC)标签的不断采用提供了许多安全性至关重要的新应用(例如，非接触式支付)。为了防止漏洞和攻击，我们在本文中开发了一个框架，允许我们分析底层的安全协议，考虑代理的位置和交换消息时的传输延迟。我们提出了两个约简结果，使得依赖于现有验证工具ProVerif的自动验证成为可能。我们的第一个结果允许人们考虑一个独特的拓扑来捕捉所有可能的攻击。第二个结果简化了考虑恐怖欺诈时的安全分析。然后，基于这些结果，我们执行了一个全面的案例研究分析(27个协议)，其中我们获得了一些协议的新的安全性证明，并检测到对其他一些协议的攻击。
papers.title_zh: 如此之近又如此之远——距离限制协议的符号验证

papers.title: Improving Unlinkability of Attribute-based Authentication through Game Theory
papers.authors: Yevhen Zolotavkin, Jongkil Jay Jeong, Veronika Kuchta, Maksym Slavnenko, Robin Doss
papers.abstract: This article first formalizes the problem of unlinkable attribute-based authentication in the system where each user possesses multiple assertions and uses them interchangeably. Currently, there are no recommendations for optimal usage of assertions in such authentication systems. To mitigate this issue, we use conditional entropy to measure the uncertainty for a Relying Party who attempts to link observed assertions with user labels. Conditional entropy is the function of usage statistics for all assertions in the system. Personal decisions made by the users about the usage of assertions contribute to these statistics. This collective effect from all the users impacts the unlinkability of authentication and must be studied using game theory. We specify several instances of the game where context information that is provided to the users differs. Through game theory and based on conditional entropy, we demonstrate how each user optimizes usage for the personal set of assertions. In the experiment, we substantiate the advantage of the proposed rational decision-making approaches: Unlinkability that we obtain under Nash equilibrium is higher than in the system where users authenticate using their assertions at random. We finally propose an algorithm that calculates equilibrium and assists users with the selection of assertions. This manifests that described techniques can be executed in realistic settings. This does not require modification of existing authentication protocols and can be implemented in platform-independent identity agents. As a use case, we describe how our technique can be used in Digital Credential Wallets: We suggest that unlinkability of authentication can be improved for Verifiable Credentials.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文首先形式化了系统中不可链接的基于属性的认证的问题，在该系统中，每个用户拥有多个断言并可互换地使用它们。目前，还没有关于在这种认证系统中最佳使用断言的建议。为了缓解这个问题，我们使用条件熵来度量试图将观察到的断言与用户标签相链接的依赖方的不确定性。条件熵是系统中所有断言的使用统计的函数。用户做出的关于断言使用的个人决定对这些统计数据有贡献。所有用户的这种集体效应会影响认证的不可链接性，必须使用博弈论来研究。我们指定了游戏的几个实例，其中提供给用户的上下文信息是不同的。通过博弈论并基于条件熵，我们演示了每个用户如何优化个人断言集的使用。在实验中，我们证实了所提出的理性决策方法的优势:我们在纳什均衡下获得的不可链接性高于用户随机使用其断言进行认证的系统。最后，我们提出了一个算法来计算均衡并帮助用户选择断言。这表明所描述的技术可以在现实环境中执行。这不需要修改现有的认证协议，并且可以在独立于平台的身份代理中实现。作为一个用例，我们描述了如何在数字证书钱包中使用我们的技术:我们建议可以为可验证的证书改进认证的不可链接性。
papers.title_zh: 用博弈论改善基于属性的认证的不可链接性

papers.title: A Deep Dive Inside DREBIN: An Explorative Analysis beyond Android Malware Detection Scores
papers.authors: Nadia Daoudi, Kevin Allix, Tegawendé François D. Assise Bissyandé, Jacques Klein
papers.abstract: Machine learning advances have been extensively explored for implementing large-scale malware detection. When reported in the literature, performance evaluation of machine learning based detectors generally focuses on highlighting the ratio of samples that are correctly or incorrectly classified, overlooking essential questions on why/how the learned models can be demonstrated as reliable. In the Android ecosystem, several recent studies have highlighted how evaluation setups can carry biases related to datasets or evaluation methodologies. Nevertheless, there is little work attempting to dissect the produced model to provide some understanding of its intrinsic characteristics. In this work, we fill this gap by performing a comprehensive analysis of a state-of-the-art Android malware detector, namely DREBIN, which constitutes today a key reference in the literature. Our study mainly targets an in-depth understanding of the classifier characteristics in terms of (1) which features actually matter among the hundreds of thousands that DREBIN extracts, (2) whether the high scores of the classifier are dependent on the dataset age, and (3) whether DREBIN’s explanations are consistent within malware families, among others. Overall, our tentative analysis provides insights into the discriminatory power of the feature set used by DREBIN to detect malware. We expect our findings to bring about a systematisation of knowledge for the community.
papers.abstract_zh: 机器学习的进步已经被广泛探索用于实现大规模恶意软件检测。当在文献中报道时，基于机器学习的检测器的性能评估通常集中于突出正确或错误分类的样本的比率，忽略了关于为什么/如何可以证明学习的模型是可靠的基本问题。在Android生态系统中，最近的几项研究强调了评估设置可能会带来与数据集或评估方法相关的偏差。然而，很少有工作试图剖析生产模型，以提供对其内在特征的一些理解。在这项工作中，我们通过对最先进的Android恶意软件检测器(即DREBIN)进行全面分析来填补这一空白，该检测器是当今文献中的重要参考。我们的研究主要旨在从以下方面深入了解分类器特征:(1)在DREBIN提取的数十万个特征中，哪些特征实际上很重要，(2)分类器的高分是否取决于数据集年龄，以及(3)DREBIN的解释在恶意软件家族中是否一致，等等。总的来说，我们的尝试性分析提供了对DREBIN用来检测恶意软件的特征集的区分能力的见解。我们期望我们的发现能为社区带来知识的系统化。
papers.title_zh: 深入垃圾箱:超越安卓恶意软件检测分数的探索性分析

papers.title: Risk Prediction of IoT Devices Based on Vulnerability Analysis
papers.authors: Pascal Oser, Rens W. van der Heijden, Stefan Lüders, Frank Kargl
papers.abstract: Internet of Things (IoT) devices are becoming more widespread not only in areas such as smart homes and smart cities but also in research and office environments. The sheer number, heterogeneity, and limited patch availability provide significant challenges for the security of both office networks and the Internet in general. The systematic estimation of device risks, which is essential for mitigation decisions, is currently a skill-intensive task that requires expertise in network vulnerability scanning, as well as manual effort in firmware binary analysis. This article introduces SAFER,1 the Security Assessment Framework for Embedded-device Risks, which enables a semi-automated risk assessment of IoT devices in any network. SAFER combines information from network device identification and automated firmware analysis to estimate the current risk associated with the device. Based on past vulnerability data and vendor patch intervals for device models, SAFER extrapolates those observations into the future using different automatically parameterized prediction models. Based on that, SAFER also estimates an indicator for future security risks. This enables users to be aware of devices exposing high risks in the future. One major strength of SAFER over other approaches is its scalability, achieved through significant automation. To demonstrate this strength, we apply SAFER in the network of a large multinational organization, to systematically assess the security level of hundreds of IoT devices on large-scale networks. Results indicate that SAFER successfully identified 531 out of 572 devices leading to a device identification rate of 92.83 %, analyzed 825 firmware images, and predicted the current and future security risk for 240 devices.
papers.abstract_zh: 物联网(IoT)设备不仅在智能家居和智能城市等领域变得越来越普遍，在研究和办公环境中也是如此。庞大的数量、异构性和有限的补丁可用性给办公网络和整个互联网的安全带来了巨大的挑战。对设备风险进行系统评估对于缓解决策至关重要，目前这是一项技能密集型任务，需要网络漏洞扫描方面的专业知识以及固件二进制分析方面的人工努力。本文介绍了SAFER，1嵌入式设备风险的安全评估框架，该框架支持对任何网络中的物联网设备进行半自动风险评估。SAFER将来自网络设备识别和自动化固件分析的信息结合起来，以估计与设备相关的当前风险。根据过去的漏洞数据和设备模型的供应商补丁时间间隔，SAFER使用不同的自动参数化预测模型将这些观察结果推断到未来。在此基础上，SAFER还估算了未来安全风险的指标。这使得用户能够意识到设备在未来会暴露出高风险。SAFER优于其他方法的一个主要优势是它的可伸缩性，这是通过显著的自动化实现的。为了展示这一优势，我们在一家大型跨国组织的网络中应用SAFER，系统地评估大规模网络中数百台物联网设备的安全级别。结果表明，SAFER成功识别了572台设备中的531台，设备识别率达到92.83 %，分析了825个固件映像，并预测了240台设备的当前和未来安全风险。
papers.title_zh: 基于脆弱性分析的物联网设备风险预测

papers.title: InkFiltration: Using Inkjet Printers for Acoustic Data Exfiltration from Air-Gapped Networks
papers.authors: Julian de Gortari Briseno, Akash Deep Singh, Mani Srivastava
papers.abstract: Printers have become ubiquitous in modern office spaces, and their placement in these spaces been guided more by accessibility than security. Due to the proximity of printers to places with potentially high-stakes information, the possible misuse of these devices is concerning. We present a previously unexplored covert channel that effectively uses the sound generated by printers with inkjet technology to exfiltrate arbitrary sensitive data (unrelated to the apparent content of the document being printed) from an air-gapped network. We also discuss a series of defense techniques that can make these devices invulnerable to covert manipulation. The proposed covert channel works by malware installed on a computer with access to a printer, injecting certain imperceptible patterns into all documents that applications on the computer send to the printer. These patterns can control the printing process without visibly altering the original content of a document, and generate acoustic signals that a nearby acoustic recording device, such as a smartphone, can capture and decode. To prove and analyze the capabilities of this new covert channel, we carried out tests considering different types of document layouts and distances between the printer and recording device. We achieved a bit error ratio less than 5% and an average bit rate of approximately 0.5 bps across all tested printers at distances up to 4 m, which is sufficient to extract tiny bits of information.
papers.abstract_zh: 打印机在现代办公空间中已经变得无处不在，它们在这些空间中的放置更多地是由可访问性而不是安全性决定的。由于打印机靠近潜在高风险信息的地方，这些设备可能被滥用是令人担忧的。我们提出了一个以前没有探索过的隐蔽通道，它有效地使用喷墨打印机产生的声音从空气隙网络中泄漏任意敏感数据(与打印的文档的表面内容无关)。我们还讨论了一系列防御技术，可以使这些设备免受秘密操纵。提议的隐蔽通道通过安装在可以访问打印机的计算机上的恶意软件来工作，将某些察觉不到的模式注入到计算机上的应用程序发送到打印机的所有文档中。这些图案可以在不明显改变文档原始内容的情况下控制打印过程，并生成附近的声音记录设备(如智能手机)可以捕捉和解码的声音信号。为了证明和分析这种新的隐蔽通道的能力，我们进行了测试，考虑了不同类型的文档布局以及打印机和记录设备之间的距离。我们在所有测试打印机上实现了小于5%的误码率和大约0.5 bps的平均比特率，最远距离为4米，这足以提取微小的信息。
papers.title_zh: 墨水过滤:使用喷墨打印机从空气间隙网络中渗透声学数据

papers.title: Differentially Private k-Nearest Neighbor Missing Data Imputation
papers.authors: Chris Clifton, Eric J. Hanson, Keith Merrill, Shawn Merrill
papers.abstract: Using techniques employing smooth sensitivity, we develop a method for \( k \) -nearest neighbor missing data imputation with differential privacy. This requires bounding the number of data incomplete tuples that can have their data complete “donor” changed by making a single addition or deletion to the dataset. The multiplicity of a single individual’s impact on an imputed dataset necessarily means our mechanisms require the addition of more noise than mechanisms that ignore missing data, but we show empirically that this is significantly outweighed by the bias reduction from imputing missing data.
papers.abstract_zh: 利用光滑敏感技术，我们发展了一种差分隐私的k近邻缺失数据插补方法。这需要限制数据不完整元组的数量，这些元组可以通过对数据集进行单个添加或删除来改变其数据完整“提供者”。单个个体对估算数据集的影响的多样性必然意味着我们的机制比忽略缺失数据的机制需要添加更多的噪声，但我们根据经验表明，这远远超过了估算缺失数据带来的偏差减少。
papers.title_zh: 差分私有k-最近邻缺失数据插补

papers.title: SoK: A Modularized Approach to Study the Security of Automatic Speech Recognition Systems
papers.authors: Yuxuan Chen, Jiangshan Zhang, Xuejing Yuan, Shengzhi Zhang, Kai Chen, Xiaofeng Wang, Shanqing Guo
papers.abstract: With the wide use of Automatic Speech Recognition (ASR) in applications such as human machine interaction, simultaneous interpretation, audio transcription, and so on, its security protection becomes increasingly important. Although recent studies have brought to light the weaknesses of popular ASR systems that enable out-of-band signal attack, adversarial attack, and so on, and further proposed various remedies (signal smoothing, adversarial training, etc.), a systematic understanding of ASR security (both attacks and defenses) is still missing, especially on how realistic such threats are and how general existing protection could be. In this article, we present our systematization of knowledge for ASR security and provide a comprehensive taxonomy for existing work based on a modularized workflow. More importantly, we align the research in this domain with that on security in Image Recognition System (IRS), which has been extensively studied, using the domain knowledge in the latter to help understand where we stand in the former. Generally, both IRS and ASR are perceptual systems. Their similarities allow us to systematically study existing literature in ASR security based on the spectrum of attacks and defense solutions proposed for IRS, and pinpoint the directions of more advanced attacks and the directions potentially leading to more effective protection in ASR. In contrast, their differences, especially the complexity of ASR compared with IRS, help us learn unique challenges and opportunities in ASR security. Particularly, our experimental study shows that transfer attacks across ASR models are feasible, even in the absence of knowledge about models (even their types) and training data.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着自动语音识别(ASR)在人机交互、同声传译、音频转录等应用中的广泛使用，其安全保护变得越来越重要。尽管最近的研究已经揭示了流行的ASR系统的弱点，这些弱点使得能够进行带外信号攻击、对抗性攻击等，并且进一步提出了各种补救措施(信号平滑、对抗性训练等。)，对ASR安全(包括攻击和防御)的系统理解仍然缺乏，特别是关于这种威胁有多现实以及现有的保护有多普遍。在本文中，我们展示了ASR安全知识的系统化，并基于模块化的工作流程为现有工作提供了全面的分类。更重要的是，我们将这一领域的研究与已被广泛研究的图像识别系统(IRS)的安全性研究结合起来，使用后者的领域知识来帮助理解我们在前者中所处的位置。一般来说，IRS和ASR都是感知系统。它们的相似性使我们能够根据针对IRS提出的攻击和防御解决方案的范围，系统地研究ASR安全方面的现有文献，并查明更高级攻击的方向以及可能导致ASR中更有效保护的方向。相比之下，它们的差异，特别是ASR与IRS相比的复杂性，有助于我们了解ASR安全方面的独特挑战和机遇。特别是，我们的实验研究表明，跨ASR模型的迁移攻击是可行的，即使在缺乏关于模型(甚至它们的类型)和训练数据的知识的情况下。
papers.title_zh: SoK:研究自动语音识别系统安全性的模块化方法

papers.title: Dealing with Security Alert Flooding: Using Machine Learning for Domain-independent Alert Aggregation
papers.authors: Max Landauer, Florian Skopik, Markus Wurzenberger, Andreas Rauber
papers.abstract: Intrusion Detection Systems (IDS) secure all kinds of IT infrastructures through automatic detection of malicious activities. Unfortunately, they are known to produce large numbers of alerts that often become overwhelming for manual analysis. Therefore, aggregation methods have been developed for filtering, grouping, and correlating alerts. However, existing techniques either rely on manually defined attack scenarios or require specific alert formats, such as IDMEF that include IP addresses. This makes the application of existing aggregation methods infeasible for alerts from host-based or anomaly-based IDSs that frequently lack such network-related data. In this paper, we therefore present a domain-independent alert aggregation technique. We introduce similarity measures and merging strategies for arbitrary semi-structured alerts and alert groups. Based on these metrics and techniques we propose an incremental procedure for the generation of abstract alert patterns that enable continuous classification of incoming alerts. Evaluations show that our approach is capable of reducing the number of alert groups for human review by around \( 80\% \) and assigning attack classifiers to the groups with true positive rates of \( 80\% \) and false positive rates lower than \( 5\% \) .
papers.abstract_zh: 入侵检测系统(IDS)通过自动检测恶意活动来保护各种IT基础设施。不幸的是，众所周知，它们会产生大量的警报，对于手动分析来说，这些警报通常会变得不堪重负。因此，已经开发了用于过滤、分组和关联警报的聚合方法。然而，现有技术要么依赖于手动定义的攻击场景，要么需要特定的警报格式，例如包含IP地址的IDMEF。这使得现有聚集方法的应用对于来自基于主机或基于异常的IDSs的警报是不可行的，这些IDSs经常缺乏这种网络相关数据。因此，在本文中，我们提出了一种独立于域的警报聚集技术。我们为任意的半结构化警报和警报组引入了相似性度量和合并策略。基于这些指标和技术，我们提出了一个用于生成抽象警报模式的增量过程，该过程能够对传入警报进行连续分类。评估表明，我们的方法能够将用于人工审查的警报组的数量减少大约80%，并且将攻击分类器分配给具有80%的真阳性率和低于5%的假阳性率的组。
papers.title_zh: 应对安全警报泛滥:使用机器学习进行独立于领域的警报聚合

papers.title: Generating Quality Threat Intelligence Leveraging OSINT and a Cyber Threat Unified Taxonomy
papers.authors: Cláudio Martins, Ibéria Medeiros
papers.abstract: Today’s threats use multiple means of propagation, such as social engineering, email, and application vulnerabilities, and often operate in different phases, such as single device compromise, lateral network movement, and data exfiltration. These complex threats rely on advanced persistent threats supported by well-advanced tactics for appearing unknown to traditional security defenses. As organizations realize that attacks are increasing in size and complexity, cyber threat intelligence (TI) is growing in popularity and use. This trend followed the evolution of advanced persistent threats, as they require a different level of response that is more specific to the organization. TI can be obtained via many formats, with open-source intelligence one of the most common, and using threat intelligence platforms (TIPs) that aid organizations to consume, produce, and share TI. TIPs have multiple advantages that enable organizations to quickly bootstrap the core processes of collecting, analyzing, and sharing threat-related information. However, current TIPs have some limitations that prevent their mass adoption. This article proposes AECCP, a platform that addresses some of the TIPs limitations. AECCP improves quality TI by classifying it accordingly a single unified taxonomy, removing the information with low value, enriching it with valuable information from open-source intelligence sources, and aggregating it for complementing information associated with the same threat. AECCP was validated and evaluated with three datasets of events and compared with two other platforms, showing that it can generate quality TI automatically and help security analysts analyze security incidents in less time.
papers.abstract_zh: 当今的威胁使用多种传播手段，如社交工程、电子邮件和应用程序漏洞，并且通常在不同阶段运行，如单个设备受损、横向网络移动和数据泄漏。这些复杂的威胁依赖于高级的持续威胁，这些威胁由非常先进的策略支持，看起来不为传统的安全防御所知。随着组织意识到攻击的规模和复杂性不断增加，网络威胁情报(TI)越来越受欢迎和使用。这种趋势随着高级持续威胁的发展而发展，因为它们需要针对组织的不同级别的响应。可以通过多种形式获取TI，开源情报是最常见的一种，并使用威胁情报平台(TIPs)来帮助组织消费、生产和共享TI。提示具有多种优势，使组织能够快速启动收集、分析和共享威胁相关信息的核心流程。然而，当前的TIPs有一些限制，阻止了它们的大规模采用。本文提出了AECCP，这是一个解决一些TIPs限制的平台。AECCP通过将TI分类为一个统一的分类体系，删除低价值的信息，从开源情报源中获取有价值的信息，并聚合这些信息以补充与同一威胁相关的信息，从而提高了TI的质量。使用三个事件数据集对AECCP进行了验证和评估，并与其他两个平台进行了比较，结果表明它可以自动生成高质量的TI，并帮助安全分析师在更短的时间内分析安全事件。
papers.title_zh: 利用OSINT和网络威胁统一分类法生成高质量的威胁情报

papers.title: Information Leakage Games: Exploring Information as a Utility Function
papers.authors: Mário S. Alvim, Konstantinos Chatzikokolakis, Yusuke Kawamoto, Catuscia Palamidessi
papers.abstract: A common goal in the areas of secure information flow and privacy is to build effective defenses against unwanted leakage of information. To this end, one must be able to reason about potential attacks and their interplay with possible defenses. In this article, we propose a game-theoretic framework to formalize strategies of attacker and defender in the context of information leakage, and provide a basis for developing optimal defense methods. A novelty of our games is that their utility is given by information leakage, which in some cases may behave in a non-linear way. This causes a significant deviation from classic game theory, in which utility functions are linear with respect to players’ strategies. Hence, a key contribution of this work is the establishment of the foundations of information leakage games. We consider two kinds of games, depending on the notion of leakage considered. The first kind, the QIF-games, is tailored for the theory of quantitative information flow. The second one, the DP-games, corresponds to differential privacy.
papers.abstract_zh: 安全信息流和隐私领域的一个共同目标是建立有效的防御措施来防止不必要的信息泄漏。为此，人们必须能够思考潜在的攻击以及它们与可能的防御之间的相互作用。在这篇文章中，我们提出了一个博弈论框架来形式化信息泄漏环境下攻击者和防御者的策略，并为开发最优防御方法提供了基础。我们游戏的一个新颖之处在于，它们的效用是由信息泄漏给出的，在某些情况下，信息泄漏可能以非线性方式表现。这导致了与经典博弈论的重大偏离，在经典博弈论中，效用函数相对于玩家的策略是线性的。因此，这项工作的一个关键贡献是建立了信息泄漏博弈的基础。我们考虑两种类型的博弈，取决于所考虑的漏损概念。第一种，QIF游戏，是为定量信息流理论量身定做的。第二个，DP-games，对应于差分隐私。
papers.title_zh: 信息泄漏游戏:探索作为效用函数的信息

papers.title: Computation on Encrypted Data Using Dataflow Authentication
papers.authors: Andreas Fischer, Benny Fuhry, Jörn Kußmaul, Jonas Janneck, Florian Kerschbaum, Eric Bodden
papers.abstract: Abstract Encrypting data before sending it to the cloud protects it against attackers, but requires the cloud to compute on encrypted data. Trusted modules, such as SGX enclaves, promise to provide a secure environment in which data can be decrypted and then processed. However, vulnerabilities in the executed program, which becomes part of the trusted code base (TCB), give attackers ample opportunity to execute arbitrary code inside the enclave. This code can modify the dataflow of the program and leak secrets via SGX side-channels. Since any larger code base is rife with vulnerabilities, it is not a good idea to outsource entire programs to SGX enclaves. A secure alternative relying solely on cryptography would be fully homomorphic encryption. However, due to its high computational complexity it is unlikely to be adopted in the near future. Researchers have made several proposals for transforming programs to perform encrypted computations on less powerful encryption schemes. Yet current approaches do not support programs making control-flow decisions based on encrypted data. We introduce the concept of dataflow authentication (DFAuth) to enable such programs. DFAuth prevents an adversary from arbitrarily deviating from the dataflow of a program. Our technique hence offers protections against the side-channel attacks described above. We implemented DFAuth using a novel authenticated homomorphic encryption scheme, a Java bytecode-tobytecode compiler producing fully executable programs, and an SGX enclave running a small and program-independent TCB. We applied DFAuth to an existing neural network that performs machine learning on sensitive medical data. The transformation yields a neural network with encrypted weights, which can be evaluated on encrypted inputs in 0.86 s.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要在将数据发送到云之前对其进行加密可以保护数据免受攻击者的攻击，但是需要云对加密的数据进行计算。可信模块，如SGX飞地，承诺提供一个安全的环境，数据可以被解密，然后处理。然而，已执行程序中的漏洞成为可信代码库(TCB)的一部分，给了攻击者在enclave中执行任意代码的充分机会。该代码可以修改程序的数据流，并通过SGX旁路泄漏机密。因为任何更大的代码库都充满了漏洞，所以将整个程序外包给SGX飞地并不是一个好主意。完全依靠密码术的安全替代方案是完全同态加密。然而，由于其高计算复杂性，它不太可能在不久的将来被采用。研究人员已经提出了几个方案来改造程序，使其在不太强大的加密方案上执行加密计算。然而，当前的方法不支持程序基于加密数据做出控制流决策。我们引入数据流认证(DFAuth)的概念来支持这样的程序。DFAuth防止对手任意偏离程序的数据流。因此，我们的技术提供了针对上述旁道攻击的保护。我们使用一个新颖的认证同态加密方案、一个生成完全可执行程序的Java字节码-tobytecode编译器和一个运行独立于程序的小型TCB的SGX飞地实现了DFAuth。我们将DFAuth应用于现有的神经网络，该网络对敏感的医疗数据进行机器学习。这种转换产生了一个具有加密权重的神经网络，可以在0.86秒内对加密输入进行评估
papers.title_zh: 使用数据流认证对加密数据进行计算

papers.title: Learning Relationship-Based Access Control Policies from Black-Box Systems
papers.authors: Padmavathi Iyer, Amirreza Masoumzadeh
papers.abstract: Access control policies are crucial in securing data in information systems. Unfortunately, often times, such policies are poorly documented, and gaps between their specification and implementation prevent the system users, and even its developers, from understanding the overall enforced policy of a system. To tackle this problem, we propose the first of its kind systematic approach for learning the enforced authorizations from a target system by interacting with and observing it as a black box. The black-box view of the target system provides the advantage of learning its overall access control policy without dealing with its internal design complexities. Furthermore, compared to the previous literature on policy mining and policy inference, we avoid exhaustive exploration of the authorization space by minimizing our observations. We focus on learning relationship-based access control (ReBAC) policy, and show how we can construct a deterministic finite automaton (DFA) to formally characterize such an enforced policy. We theoretically analyze our proposed learning approach by studying its termination, correctness, and complexity. Furthermore, we conduct extensive experimental analysis based on realistic application scenarios to establish its cost, quality of learning, and scalability in practice.
papers.abstract_zh: 访问控制策略对于保护信息系统中的数据至关重要。不幸的是，这样的策略常常没有被很好地记录，并且它们的规范和实现之间的差距阻止了系统用户，甚至是它的开发者理解系统的整体实施策略。为了解决这个问题，我们提出了第一种系统方法，通过与目标系统交互并将其作为黑盒来观察，从目标系统学习强制授权。目标系统的黑盒视图提供了了解其整体访问控制策略的优势，而无需处理其内部设计复杂性。此外，与先前关于策略挖掘和策略推理的文献相比，我们通过最小化我们的观察来避免对授权空间的详尽探索。我们着重于学习基于关系的访问控制(ReBAC)策略，并展示我们如何构建一个确定性有限自动机(DFA)来形式化地描述这种强制策略。我们从理论上分析了我们提出的学习方法，研究了它的终止性，正确性和复杂性。此外，我们基于实际应用场景进行了广泛的实验分析，以确定其成本、学习质量和实践中的可扩展性。
papers.title_zh: 从黑盒系统中学习基于关系的访问控制策略

papers.title: EI-MTD: Moving Target Defense for Edge Intelligence against Adversarial Attacks
papers.authors: Yaguan Qian, Yankai Guo, Qiqi Shao, Jiamin Wang, Bin Wang, Zhaoquan Gu, Xiang Ling, Chunming Wu
papers.abstract: Edge intelligence has played an important role in constructing smart cities, but the vulnerability of edge nodes to adversarial attacks becomes an urgent problem. A so-called adversarial example can fool a deep learning model on an edge node for misclassification. Due to the transferability property of adversarial examples, an adversary can easily fool a black-box model by a local substitute model. Edge nodes in general have limited resources, which cannot afford a complicated defense mechanism like that on a cloud data center. To address the challenge, we propose a dynamic defense mechanism, namely EI-MTD. The mechanism first obtains robust member models of small size through differential knowledge distillation from a complicated teacher model on a cloud data center. Then, a dynamic scheduling policy, which builds on a Bayesian Stackelberg game, is applied to the choice of a target model for service. This dynamic defense mechanism can prohibit the adversary from selecting an optimal substitute model for black-box attacks. We also conduct extensive experiments to evaluate the proposed mechanism, and results show that EI-MTD could protect edge intelligence effectively against adversarial attacks in black-box settings.
papers.abstract_zh: 边缘智能在智慧城市建设中发挥了重要作用，但边缘节点易受恶意攻击成为亟待解决的问题。一个所谓的对抗性例子可以在一个边缘节点上愚弄一个深度学习模型进行错误分类。由于对立例子的可传递性，对手可以很容易地通过局部替代模型来欺骗黑盒模型。边缘节点通常资源有限，无法承受像云数据中心那样复杂的防御机制。为了应对这一挑战，我们提出了一种动态防御机制，即EI-MTD。该机制首先从云数据中心复杂的教师模型中通过差分知识提取获得小规模的健壮成员模型。然后，基于贝叶斯Stackelberg博弈的动态调度策略被应用于服务目标模型的选择。这种动态防御机制可以阻止对手为黑盒攻击选择最优的替代模型。我们还进行了大量的实验来评估所提出的机制，实验结果表明EI-MTD可以有效地保护边缘情报免受黑盒环境中的对抗性攻击。
papers.title_zh: EI-MTD:边缘情报对抗敌对攻击的移动目标防御

papers.title: Privacy-Preserving Decision Trees Training and Prediction
papers.authors: Adi Akavia, Max Leibovich, Yehezkel S. Resheff, Roey Ron, Moni Shahar, Margarita Vald
papers.abstract: In the era of cloud computing and machine learning, data has become a highly valuable resource. Recent history has shown that the benefits brought forth by this data driven culture come at a cost of potential data leakage. Such breaches have a devastating impact on individuals and industry, and lead the community to seek privacy preserving solutions. A promising approach is to utilize Fully Homomorphic Encryption ( \( \mathsf {FHE } \) ) to enable machine learning over encrypted data, thus providing resiliency against information leakage. However, computing over encrypted data incurs a high computational overhead, thus requiring the redesign of algorithms, in an “ \( \mathsf {FHE } \) -friendly” manner, to maintain their practicality. In this work we focus on the ever-popular tree based methods, and propose a new privacy-preserving solution to training and prediction for trees over data encrypted with homomorphic encryption. Our solution employs a low-degree approximation for the step-function together with a lightweight interactive protocol, to replace components of the vanilla algorithm that are costly over encrypted data. Our protocols for decision trees achieve practical usability demonstrated on standard UCI datasets encrypted with fully homomorphic encryption. In addition, the communication complexity of our protocols is independent of the tree size and dataset size in prediction and training, respectively, which significantly improves on prior works.1
papers.abstract_zh: 在云计算和机器学习时代，数据已经成为一种非常有价值的资源。最近的历史表明，这种数据驱动的文化带来的好处是以潜在的数据泄露为代价的。这种破坏对个人和行业具有毁灭性的影响，并导致社区寻求保护隐私的解决方案。一种有前途的方法是利用全同态加密(\( \mathsf {FHE } \))来实现对加密数据的机器学习，从而提供对信息泄漏的弹性。然而，对加密数据进行计算会导致很高的计算开销，因此需要以一种“\( \mathsf {FHE } \)”友好的方式重新设计算法，以保持其实用性。在这项工作中，我们重点研究了日益流行的基于树的方法，并提出了一种新的隐私保护解决方案来训练和预测基于同态加密数据的树。我们的解决方案采用了阶跃函数的低阶近似和轻量级交互协议，以取代普通算法中对加密数据开销较大的部分。我们的决策树协议在用全同态加密加密的标准UCI数据集上实现了实际的可用性。此外，我们的协议的通信复杂性分别独立于预测和训练中的树大小和数据集大小，这显著改进了先前的工作。1
papers.title_zh: 隐私保护决策树的训练和预测

papers.title: Accountable Private Set Cardinality for Distributed Measurement
papers.authors: Ellis Fenske, Akshaya Mani, Aaron Johnson, Micah Sherr
papers.abstract: We introduce cryptographic protocols for securely and efficiently computing the cardinality of set union and set intersection. Our private set-cardinality protocols (PSC) are designed for the setting in which a large set of parties in a distributed system makes observations, and a small set of parties with more resources and higher reliability aggregates the observations. PSC allows for secure and useful statistics gathering in privacy-preserving distributed systems. For example, it allows operators of anonymity networks such as Tor to securely answer the questions: How many unique users are using the network? and How many hidden services are being accessed? We prove the correctness and security of PSC in the Universal Composability framework against an active adversary that compromises all but one of the aggregating parties. Although successful output cannot be guaranteed in this setting, PSC either succeeds or terminates with an abort, and we furthermore make the adversary accountable for causing an abort by blaming at least one malicious party. We also show that PSC prevents adaptive corruption of the data parties from revealing past observations, which prevents them from being victims of targeted compromise, and we ensure safe measurements by making outputs differentially private. We present a proof-of-concept implementation of PSC and use it to demonstrate that PSC operates with low computational overhead and reasonable bandwidth. It can count tens of thousands of unique observations from tens to hundreds of data-collecting parties while completing within hours. PSC is thus suitable for daily measurements in a distributed system.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们介绍了安全有效地计算集合并和集合交的基数的密码协议。我们的私有集基数协议(PSC)是为分布式系统中的一大组参与者进行观察，而具有更多资源和更高可靠性的一小组参与者聚集观察而设计的。PSC允许在保护隐私的分布式系统中收集安全和有用的统计数据。例如，它允许Tor等匿名网络的运营商安全地回答以下问题:有多少不同的用户正在使用该网络？有多少隐藏的服务正在被访问？我们在通用可组合性框架中证明了PSC的正确性和安全性，以对抗一个除了一个聚合方之外的所有聚合方都妥协的主动对手。尽管在这种设置中不能保证成功的输出，PSC要么成功，要么以中止终止，并且我们进一步通过指责至少一个恶意方来使对手对引起中止负责。我们还表明，PSC防止数据方的适应性破坏暴露过去的观察结果，从而防止他们成为有针对性的妥协的受害者，并且我们通过使输出有差别地私有来确保安全测量。我们提出了PSC的概念验证实现，并使用它来证明PSC以低计算开销和合理的带宽运行。它可以对来自数十到数百个数据收集方的数万个独特观察进行计数，同时在数小时内完成。因此，PSC适用于分布式系统中的日常测量。
papers.title_zh: 分布式测量的可问责私有集基数

papers.title: Hidden in Plain Sight: Exploring Privacy Risks of Mobile Augmented Reality Applications
papers.authors: Sarah M. Lehman, Abrar S. Alrumayh, Kunal Kolhe, Haibin Ling, Chiu C. Tan
papers.abstract: Mobile augmented reality systems are becoming increasingly common and powerful, with applications in such domains as healthcare, manufacturing, education, and more. This rise in popularity is thanks in part to the functionalities offered by commercially available vision libraries such as ARCore, Vuforia, and Google’s ML Kit; however, these libraries also give rise to the possibility of a hidden operations threat, that is, the ability of a malicious or incompetent application developer to conduct additional vision operations behind the scenes of an otherwise honest AR application without alerting the end-user. In this article, we present the privacy risks associated with the hidden operations threat and propose a framework for application development and runtime permissions targeted specifically at preventing the execution of hidden operations. We follow this with a set of experimental results, exploring the feasibility and utility of our system in differentiating between user-expectation-compliant and non-compliant AR applications during runtime testing, for which preliminary results demonstrate accuracy of up to 71%. We conclude with a discussion of open problems in the areas of software testing and privacy standards in mobile AR systems.
papers.abstract_zh: 移动增强现实系统正变得越来越普遍和强大，应用于医疗保健、制造、教育等领域。这种受欢迎程度的提高部分归功于商业上可用的视觉库提供的功能，如ARCore、Vuforia和Google的ML工具包；然而，这些库也增加了隐藏操作威胁的可能性，也就是说，恶意或不称职的应用程序开发人员能够在诚实的AR应用程序的幕后进行额外的视觉操作，而不会提醒最终用户。在本文中，我们介绍了与隐藏操作威胁相关的隐私风险，并提出了一个专门针对防止隐藏操作执行的应用程序开发和运行时权限框架。我们随后提供了一组实验结果，探索我们的系统在运行时测试期间区分符合用户期望和不符合用户期望的AR应用程序的可行性和实用性，初步结果显示准确率高达71%。最后，我们讨论了移动增强现实系统中软件测试和隐私标准领域中的公开问题。
papers.title_zh: 隐藏在众目睽睽之下:探索移动增强现实应用的隐私风险

papers.title: In the Land of MMUs: Multiarchitecture OS-Agnostic Virtual Memory Forensics
papers.authors: Andrea Oliveri, Davide Balzarotti
papers.abstract: The first step required to perform any analysis of a physical memory image is the reconstruction of the virtual address spaces, which allows translating virtual addresses to their corresponding physical offsets. However, this phase is often overlooked, and the challenges related to it are rarely discussed in the literature. Practical tools solve the problem by using a set of custom heuristics tailored on a very small number of well-known operating systems (OSs) running on few architectures. In this article, we look for the first time at all the different ways the virtual to physical translation can be operated in 10 different CPU architectures. In each case, we study the inviolable constraints imposed by the memory management unit that can be used to build signatures to recover the required data structures from memory without any knowledge about the running OS. We build a proof-of-concept tool to experiment with the extraction of virtual address spaces showing the challenges of performing an OS-agnostic virtual to physical address translation in real-world scenarios. We conduct experiments on a large set of 26 different OSs and a use case on a real hardware device. Finally, we show a possible usage of our technique to retrieve information about user space processes running on an unknown OS without any knowledge of its internals.
papers.abstract_zh: 对物理内存映像进行任何分析所需的第一步是虚拟地址空间的重建，这允许将虚拟地址转换为它们相应的物理偏移量。然而，这一阶段往往被忽视，与此相关的挑战很少在文献中讨论。实用工具通过使用一组定制的试探法来解决这个问题，这些试探法是针对运行在少数架构上的极少数众所周知的操作系统(OS)定制的。在本文中，我们首次探讨了虚拟到物理转换可以在10种不同的CPU架构中运行的所有不同方式。在每种情况下，我们研究内存管理单元施加的不可侵犯的约束，这些约束可用于构建签名，以便在不了解运行的操作系统的情况下从内存中恢复所需的数据结构。我们构建了一个概念验证工具来试验虚拟地址空间的提取，展示了在真实场景中执行操作系统无关的虚拟到物理地址转换的挑战。我们在26个不同的操作系统和一个真实硬件设备的用例上进行了实验。最后，我们展示了我们的技术的一种可能的用法，在不了解其内部的情况下，检索关于运行在未知操作系统上的用户空间进程的信息。
papers.title_zh: 在MMUs领域:多架构操作系统无关的虚拟内存取证

papers.title: Valued Authorization Policy Existence Problem: Theory and Experiments
papers.authors: Jason Crampton, Eduard Eiben, Gregory Z. Gutin, Daniel Karapetyan, Diptapriyo Majumdar
papers.abstract: Recent work has shown that many problems of satisfiability and resiliency in workflows may be viewed as special cases of the authorization policy existence problem (APEP), which returns an authorization policy if one exists and “No” otherwise. However, in many practical settings it would be more useful to obtain a “least bad” policy than just a “No,” where “least bad” is characterized by some numerical value indicating the extent to which the policy violates the base authorization relation and constraints. Accordingly, we introduce the Valued APEP, which returns an authorization policy of minimum weight, where the (non-negative) weight is determined by the constraints violated by the returned solution. We then establish a number of results concerning the parameterized complexity of Valued APEP. We prove that the problem is fixed-parameter tractable (FPT) if the set of constraints satisfies two restrictions, but is intractable if only one of these restrictions holds. (Most constraints known to be of practical use satisfy both restrictions.) Our analysis is based on the novel concept of a user profile. We also introduce a new type of resiliency problem in the context of workflow satisfiability, show how it can be addressed using Valued APEP, and use this to build a set of benchmark instances for Valued APEP. We describe two different formulations of this problem using mixed integer programming and report the results of computational experiments which solve the problem using these formulations as input to a general-purpose solver. Our results show that the formulation which employs the user profile concept, has FPT-like running time and usually significantly outperforms our naive formulation of the problem.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近的工作表明，工作流中的许多可满足性和弹性问题可以被视为授权策略存在问题(APEP)的特例，如果存在授权策略，则返回授权策略，否则返回“否”。然而，在许多实际设置中，获得“最不坏”的策略比仅仅获得“不”更有用，其中“最不坏”由某个数值来表征，该数值指示策略违反基本授权关系和约束的程度。因此，我们引入了赋值APEP，它返回最小权重的授权策略，其中(非负)权重由返回的解所违反的约束来确定。然后我们建立了一些关于值APEP的参数化复杂性的结果。我们证明了如果约束集满足两个约束，问题是固定参数可处理的，但是如果只有一个约束成立，问题是不可处理的。(大多数已知的实用约束满足这两个条件。)我们的分析基于用户简档的新概念。我们还在工作流可满足性的上下文中引入了一种新的弹性问题，展示了如何使用有值APEP来解决它，并使用它来构建一组有值APEP的基准实例。我们使用混合整数规划描述了该问题的两种不同的公式，并报告了使用这些公式作为通用求解器的输入来解决该问题的计算实验的结果。我们的结果表明，采用用户简档概念的公式具有类似FPT的运行时间，并且通常显著优于我们的问题的简单公式。
papers.title_zh: 有值授权策略存在问题:理论与实验

papers.title: PRShare: A Framework for Privacy-preserving, Interorganizational Data Sharing
papers.authors: Lihi Idan, Joan Feigenbaum
papers.abstract: We consider the task of interorganizational data sharing, in which data owners, data clients, and data subjects have different and sometimes competing privacy concerns. One real-world scenario in which this problem arises concerns law-enforcement use of phone-call metadata: The data owner is a phone company, the data clients are law-enforcement agencies, and the data subjects are individuals who make phone calls. A key challenge in this type of scenario is that each organization uses its own set of proprietary intraorganizational attributes to describe the shared data; such attributes cannot be shared with other organizations. Moreover, data-access policies are determined by multiple parties and may be specified using attributes that are not directly comparable with the ones used by the owner to specify the data. We propose a system architecture and a suite of protocols that facilitate dynamic and efficient interorganizational data sharing, while allowing each party to use its own set of proprietary attributes to describe the shared data and preserving the confidentiality of both data records and proprietary intraorganizational attributes. We introduce the novel technique of Attribute-Based Encryption with Oblivious Attribute Translation (OTABE), which plays a crucial role in our solution. This extension of attribute-based encryption uses semi-trusted proxies to enable dynamic and oblivious translation between proprietary attributes that belong to different organizations; it supports hidden access policies, direct revocation, and fine-grained, data-centric keys and queries. We prove that our OTABE-based framework is secure in the standard model and provide two real-world use cases.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们考虑组织间数据共享的任务，其中数据所有者、数据客户端和数据主体具有不同的、有时是竞争的隐私关注。出现这一问题的一个真实场景涉及电话呼叫元数据的执法使用:数据所有者是一家电话公司，数据客户端是执法机构，数据主体是打电话的个人。这种情况下的一个关键挑战是，每个组织都使用自己的专有组织内属性集来描述共享数据；这些属性不能与其他组织共享。此外，数据访问策略是由多方确定的，并且可能使用与所有者用来指定数据的属性不直接可比的属性来指定。我们提出了一个系统架构和一套协议，以促进动态和有效的组织间数据共享，同时允许各方使用其自己的专有属性集来描述共享数据，并保持数据记录和专有组织内属性的机密性。我们介绍了新的基于属性的加密技术和不经意属性翻译(OTABE)，它在我们的解决方案中起着至关重要的作用。这种基于属性的加密的扩展使用半可信代理来实现属于不同组织的专有属性之间的动态和不经意的转换；它支持隐藏访问策略、直接撤销以及细粒度的、以数据为中心的键和查询。我们证明了我们的基于OTABE的框架在标准模型中是安全的，并提供了两个真实世界的用例。
papers.title_zh: PRShare:一个保护隐私、跨组织数据共享的框架

papers.title: What is Beautiful is Secure
papers.authors: Milica Stojmenovic, Eric Spero, Milos Stojmenovic, Robert Biddle
papers.abstract: Visual appeal has been shown to influence perceptions of usability and credibility, and we hypothesize that something similar is happening with user judgments of website security: What is beautiful is secure. Web certificates provide reliable information about a website’s level of security, presented in browser interfaces. Users should use this to inform their trust decisions online, but evidence from laboratory studies and real-world usage suggests that they do not. We conducted two studies—one in lab, and one online—in which participants view and interact with websites with high and low visual appeal, and various security levels, and then make security-related judgments. In both studies, participants consistently rated visually appealing websites as more secure, and indicated they would be more likely to enter sensitive information into visually appealing websites—even when they were less secure. Our results provide evidence that users rely on visual appeal when making security and trust decisions on websites. We discuss how these results may be used to help users.
papers.abstract_zh: 视觉吸引力已经被证明会影响可用性和可信度的感知，我们假设用户对网站安全性的判断也会发生类似的事情:漂亮的就是安全的。Web证书提供了关于网站安全级别的可靠信息，显示在浏览器界面中。用户应该利用这一点在网上做出信任决定，但来自实验室研究和现实世界使用的证据表明，他们并没有这样做。我们进行了两项研究，一项在实验室进行，一项在网上进行。在研究中，参与者查看具有高、低视觉吸引力和各种安全级别的网站并与之互动，然后做出与安全相关的判断。在这两项研究中，参与者一致认为视觉上有吸引力的网站更安全，并表示他们更有可能在视觉上有吸引力的网站上输入敏感信息——即使这些网站不太安全。我们的研究结果证明，用户在网站上做出安全和信任决策时，依赖于视觉吸引力。我们讨论如何使用这些结果来帮助用户。
papers.title_zh: 美丽的东西是安全的

papers.title: Privacy Analysis of Query-Set-Size Control
papers.authors: Eyal Nussbaum, Michael Segal
papers.abstract: The publication of user data for statistical analysis and research can be extremely beneficial for both academic and commercial uses, such as statistical research and recommendation systems. To maintain user privacy when such a publication occurs many databases employ anonymization techniques, either on the query results or the data itself. In this article, we examine and analyze the privacy offered when using the query-set-size control method for aggregate queries over a data structures representing various topologies. We focus on the mathematical queries of minimum, maximum, median, and average and show some query types that may be used to extract hidden information. We prove some combinations of these queries will maintain a measurable level of privacy even when using multiple queries. We offer a privacy probability measure, indicating the probability of an attacker to obtain information defined as sensitive by utilizing legitimate queries over such a system. Our results are mathematically proven and backed by simulations using vehicular network data based on the TAPASCologne project.
papers.abstract_zh: 发布用于统计分析和研究的用户数据对于学术和商业用途都非常有益，例如统计研究和推荐系统。当这种发布发生时，为了维护用户隐私，许多数据库在查询结果或数据本身上采用匿名化技术。在本文中，我们检查和分析了在表示各种拓扑的数据结构上使用聚集查询的查询集大小控制方法时所提供的保密性。我们重点关注最小值、最大值、中值和平均值的数学查询，并展示一些可用于提取隐藏信息的查询类型。我们证明了这些查询的一些组合即使在使用多个查询时也能保持可测量的隐私级别。我们提供了一种隐私概率度量，表示攻击者通过在这样的系统上利用合法查询获得被定义为敏感的信息的概率。我们的结果得到了数学上的证明，并得到了基于TAPASCologne项目的车辆网络数据模拟的支持。
papers.title_zh: 查询集大小控制的隐私分析

papers.title: Dynamic Binary Translation for SGX Enclaves
papers.authors: Jinhua Cui, Shweta Shinde, Satyaki Sen, Prateek Saxena, Pinghai Yuan
papers.abstract: Enclaves, such as those enabled by Intel SGX, offer a hardware primitive for shielding user-level applications from the OS. While enclaves are a useful starting point, code running in the enclave requires additional checks whenever control or data is transferred to/from the untrusted OS. The enclave-OS interface on SGX, however, can be extremely large if we wish to run existing unmodified binaries inside enclaves. This article presents Ratel, a dynamic binary translation engine running inside SGX enclaves on Linux. Ratel offers complete interposition, the ability to interpose on all executed instructions in the enclave and monitor all interactions with the OS. Instruction-level interposition offers a general foundation for implementing a large variety of inline security monitors in thefuture. We take a principled approach in explaining why complete interposition on SGX is challenging. We draw attention to five design decisions in SGX that create fundamental trade-offs between performance and ensuring complete interposition, and we explain how to resolve them in the favor of complete interposition. To illustrate the utility of the Ratel framework, we present the first attempt to offer binary compatibility with existing software on SGX. We report that Ratel offers binary compatibility with over 200 programs we tested, including micro-benchmarks and real applications, such as Linux shell utilities. Runtimes for two programming languages, namely, Python and R, tested with standard benchmarks work out-of-the-box on Ratel without any specialized handling.
papers.abstract_zh: Enclaves，例如英特尔SGX支持的Enclaves，提供了一个硬件原语，用于将用户级应用与操作系统屏蔽开来。虽然enclave是一个有用的起点，但是每当控制或数据传输到不受信任的操作系统或从不受信任的操作系统传输时，在enclave中运行的代码都需要额外的检查。然而，如果我们希望在enclave中运行现有的未修改的二进制文件，SGX上的enclave-OS接口可能会非常大。本文介绍Ratel，这是一个运行在Linux上SGX飞地内部的动态二进制翻译引擎。Ratel提供完整的干预，能够干预enclave中所有执行的指令，并监控与操作系统的所有交互。指令级插入为将来实现各种各样的内联安全监视器提供了一个通用的基础。我们采取了原则性的方法来解释为什么完全干预SGX是具有挑战性的。我们提请注意SGX的五个设计决策，它们在性能和确保完全插入之间建立了基本的权衡，我们解释了如何解决它们以支持完全插入。为了说明Ratel框架的实用性，我们首次尝试在SGX上提供与现有软件的二进制兼容性。我们报告说，Ratel提供了与我们测试的200多个程序的二进制兼容性，包括微基准和真实应用程序，如Linux shell实用程序。使用标准基准测试的两种编程语言(即Python和R)的运行时在Ratel上开箱即用，无需任何专门处理。
papers.title_zh: SGX飞地的动态二进制翻译

papers.title: HotFuzz: Discovering Temporal and Spatial Denial-of-Service Vulnerabilities Through Guided Micro-Fuzzing
papers.authors: William Blair, Andrea Mambretti, Sajjad Arshad, Michael Weissbacher, William Robertson, Engin Kirda, Manuel Egele
papers.abstract: Fuzz testing repeatedly assails software with random inputs in order to trigger unexpected program behaviors, such as crashes or timeouts, and has historically revealed serious security vulnerabilities. In this article, we present HotFuzz, a framework for automatically discovering Algorithmic Complexity (AC) time and space vulnerabilities in Java libraries. HotFuzz uses micro-fuzzing, a genetic algorithm that evolves arbitrary Java objects in order to trigger the worst-case performance for a method under test. We define Small Recursive Instantiation (SRI) as a technique to derive seed inputs represented as Java objects to micro-fuzzing. After micro-fuzzing, HotFuzz synthesizes test cases that triggered AC vulnerabilities into Java programs and monitors their execution in order to reproduce vulnerabilities outside the fuzzing framework. HotFuzz outputs those programs that exhibit high resource utilization as witnesses for AC vulnerabilities in a Java library. We evaluate HotFuzz over the Java Runtime Environment (JRE), the 100 most popular Java libraries on Maven, and challenges contained in the DARPA Space and Time Analysis for Cybersecurity (STAC) program. We evaluate SRI’s effectiveness by comparing the performance of micro-fuzzing with SRI, measured by the number of AC vulnerabilities detected, to simply using empty values as seed inputs. In this evaluation, we verified known AC vulnerabilities, discovered previously unknown AC vulnerabilities that we responsibly reported to vendors, and received confirmation from both IBM and Oracle. Our results demonstrate that micro-fuzzing finds AC vulnerabilities in real-world software, and that micro-fuzzing with SRI-derived seed inputs outperforms using empty values in both the temporal and spatial domains.
papers.abstract_zh: 模糊测试用随机输入反复攻击软件，以触发意想不到的程序行为，如崩溃或超时，并在历史上揭示了严重的安全漏洞。在本文中，我们介绍了HotFuzz，这是一个用于自动发现Java库中算法复杂性(AC)时间和空间漏洞的框架。HotFuzz使用micro-fuzzing，这是一种遗传算法，可以进化任意Java对象，以触发测试方法的最坏情况性能。我们将小型递归实例化(SRI)定义为一种技术，用于派生表示为Java对象的种子输入以进行微模糊化。微fuzzing之后，HotFuzz将触发AC漏洞的测试用例合成到Java程序中，并监控它们的执行，以便在fuzzing框架之外重现漏洞。HotFuzz输出那些表现出高资源利用率的程序，作为Java库中AC漏洞的见证。我们评估了Java运行时环境(JRE)上的HotFuzz、Maven上100个最受欢迎的Java库，以及DARPA网络安全时空分析(STAC)计划中包含的挑战。我们通过比较微模糊化和SRI的性能来评估SRI的有效性，通过检测到的AC漏洞的数量来衡量，并简单地使用空值作为种子输入。在这次评估中，我们验证了已知的AC漏洞，发现了以前未知的AC漏洞，我们负责任地向供应商报告了这些漏洞，并得到了IBM和Oracle的确认。我们的结果表明，微模糊发现真实世界软件中的AC漏洞，并且使用SRI衍生的种子输入的微模糊在时间和空间域中都优于使用空值。
papers.title_zh: HotFuzz:通过引导微模糊发现时空拒绝服务漏洞

papers.title: FENCE: Feasible Evasion Attacks on Neural Networks in Constrained Environments
papers.authors: Alesia Chernikova, Alina Oprea
papers.abstract: As advances in Deep Neural Networks (DNNs) demonstrate unprecedented levels of performance in many critical applications, their vulnerability to attacks is still an open question. We consider evasion attacks at testing time against Deep Learning in constrained environments, in which dependencies between features need to be satisfied. These situations may arise naturally in tabular data or may be the result of feature engineering in specific application domains, such as threat detection in cyber security. We propose a general iterative gradient-based framework called FENCE for crafting evasion attacks that take into consideration the specifics of constrained domains and application requirements. We apply it against Feed-Forward Neural Networks trained for two cyber security applications: network traffic botnet classification and malicious domain classification, to generate feasible adversarial examples. We extensively evaluate the success rate and performance of our attacks, compare their improvement over several baselines, and analyze factors that impact the attack success rate, including the optimization objective and the data imbalance. We show that with minimal effort (e.g., generating 12 additional network connections), an attacker can change the model’s prediction from the Malicious class to Benign and evade the classifier. We show that models trained on datasets with higher imbalance are more vulnerable to our FENCE attacks. Finally, we demonstrate the potential of performing adversarial training in constrained domains to increase the model resilience against these evasion attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着深度神经网络(DNNs)在许多关键应用中表现出前所未有的性能水平，它们对攻击的脆弱性仍然是一个公开的问题。我们考虑在约束环境中针对深度学习的测试时规避攻击，其中特征之间的依赖需要被满足。这些情况可能在表格数据中自然出现，也可能是特定应用领域中的特征工程的结果，例如网络安全中的威胁检测。我们提出了一个称为FENCE的通用迭代梯度框架，用于考虑受限领域和应用需求的细节来设计规避攻击。我们将它应用于为两个网络安全应用训练的前馈神经网络:网络流量僵尸网络分类和恶意域分类，以生成可行的对抗实例。我们广泛评估我们攻击的成功率和性能，比较它们在几个基线上的改进，并分析影响攻击成功率的因素，包括优化目标和数据不平衡。我们表明，攻击者只需付出最少的努力(例如，生成12个额外的网络连接)，就可以将模型的预测从恶意类别更改为良性类别，并避开分类器。我们表明，在具有较高不平衡的数据集上训练的模型更容易受到我们的栅栏攻击。最后，我们展示了在受限域中执行对抗性训练的潜力，以增加模型对这些规避攻击的弹性。
papers.title_zh: 栅栏:约束环境下神经网络的可行规避攻击

2023.journals_title: ACM Transactions on Privacy and Security, Volume 26

papers.title: Differentially Private Real-Time Release of Sequential Data
papers.authors: Xueru Zhang, Mohammad Mahdi Khalili, Mingyan Liu
papers.abstract: Many data analytics applications rely on temporal data, generated (and possibly acquired) sequentially for online analysis. How to release this type of data in a privacy-preserving manner is of great interest and more challenging than releasing one-time, static data. Because of the (potentially strong) temporal correlation within the data sequence, the overall privacy loss can accumulate significantly over time; an attacker with statistical knowledge of the correlation can be particularly hard to defend against. An idea that has been explored in the literature to mitigate this problem is to factor this correlation into the perturbation/noise mechanism. Existing work, however, either focuses on the offline setting (where perturbation is designed and introduced after the entire sequence has become available), or requires a priori information on the correlation in generating perturbation. In this study we propose an approach where the correlation is learned as the sequence is generated, and is used for estimating future data in the sequence. This estimate then drives the generation of the noisy released data. This method allows us to design better perturbation and is suitable for real-time operations. Using the notion of differential privacy, we show this approach achieves high accuracy with lower privacy loss compared to existing methods.
papers.abstract_zh: 许多数据分析应用程序依赖于时序数据，这些数据是为进行在线分析而顺序生成的(也可能是获取的)。如何以保护隐私的方式发布这种类型的数据非常有趣，并且比发布一次性的静态数据更具挑战性。由于数据序列中的(潜在的强)时间相关性，总的隐私损失会随着时间的推移而显著累积；具有相关性统计知识的攻击者尤其难以防御。在文献中已经探索的减轻该问题的想法是将这种相关性纳入扰动/噪声机制。然而，现有的工作要么集中于离线设置(在整个序列变得可用之后设计和引入扰动)，要么需要关于产生扰动的相关性的先验信息。在这项研究中，我们提出了一种方法，其中相关性是在序列生成时学习的，并用于估计序列中的未来数据。然后，这种估计推动了噪声发布数据的生成。这种方法允许我们设计更好的扰动，并且适合于实时操作。使用差分隐私的概念，我们表明，与现有的方法相比，该方法实现了较高的准确性和较低的隐私损失。
papers.title_zh: 时序数据的差分私有实时释放

papers.title: Contact Discovery in Mobile Messengers: Low-cost Attacks, Quantitative Analyses, and Efficient Mitigations
papers.authors: Christoph Hagen, Christian Weinert, Christoph Sendner, Alexandra Dmitrienko, Thomas Schneider
papers.abstract: Contact discovery allows users of mobile messengers to conveniently connect with people in their address book. In this work, we demonstrate that severe privacy issues exist in currently deployed contact discovery methods and propose suitable mitigations. Our study of three popular messengers (WhatsApp, Signal, and Telegram) shows that large-scale crawling attacks are (still) possible. Using an accurate database of mobile phone number prefixes and very few resources, we queried 10 % of US mobile phone numbers for WhatsApp and 100 % for Signal. For Telegram, we find that its API exposes a wide range of sensitive information, even about numbers not registered with the service. We present interesting (cross-messenger) usage statistics, which also reveal that very few users change the default privacy settings. Furthermore, we demonstrate that currently deployed hashing-based contact discovery protocols are severely broken by comparing three methods for efficient hash reversal. Most notably, we show that with the password cracking tool “JTR,” we can iterate through the entire worldwide mobile phone number space in < 150 s on a consumer-grade GPU. We also propose a significantly improved rainbow table construction for non-uniformly distributed input domains that is of independent interest. Regarding mitigations, we most notably propose two novel rate-limiting schemes: our incremental contact discovery for services without server-side contact storage strictly improves over Signal’s current approach while being compatible with private set intersection, whereas our differential scheme allows even stricter rate limits at the overhead for service providers to store a small constant-size state that does not reveal any contact information.
papers.abstract_zh: 联系人发现允许移动信使的用户方便地与他们地址簿中的人联系。在这项工作中，我们证明了严重的隐私问题存在于目前部署的接触发现方法，并提出适当的缓解措施。我们对三个流行的信使(WhatsApp、Signal和Telegram)的研究表明，大规模的爬行攻击(仍然)是可能的。利用精确的手机号码前缀数据库和极少的资源，我们为WhatsApp查询了10 %的美国手机号码，为Signal查询了100 %。对于Telegram，我们发现其API暴露了广泛的敏感信息，甚至是关于未在服务中注册的号码。我们提供了有趣的(跨信使)使用统计，这也揭示了很少用户改变默认的隐私设置。此外，通过比较三种有效的哈希反转方法，我们证明了当前部署的基于哈希的联系发现协议被严重破坏。最值得注意的是，我们展示了使用密码破解工具“JTR”，我们可以在消费级GPU上在不到150秒的时间内遍历整个全球移动电话号码空间。我们还提出了一个显著改进的独立感兴趣的非均匀分布输入域的彩虹表构造。关于缓解，我们最引人注目地提出了两种新颖的速率限制方案:我们的用于服务的增量联系发现没有服务器端联系存储，严格地改进了Signal的当前方法，同时与私有集合交集兼容，而我们的差分方案允许在服务提供者存储不暴露任何联系信息的小的恒定大小状态的开销上的甚至更严格的速率限制。
papers.title_zh: 移动信使中的联系发现:低成本攻击、定量分析和有效缓解

papers.title: A Systematic Analysis of the Capital One Data Breach: Critical Lessons Learned
papers.authors: Shaharyar Khan, Ilya Kabanov, Yunke Hua, Stuart E. Madnick
papers.abstract: The 2019 Capital One data breach was one of the largest data breaches impacting the privacy and security of personal information of over a 100 million individuals. In most reports about a cyberattack, you will often hear that it succeeded because a single employee clicked on a link in a phishing email or forgot to patch some software, making it seem like an isolated, one-off, trivial problem involving maybe one person, committing a mistake or being negligent. But that is usually not the complete story. By ignoring the related managerial and organizational failures, you are leaving in place the conditions for the next breach. Using our Cybersafety analysis methodology, we identified control failures spanning control levels, going from rather technical issues up to top management, the Board of Directors, and Government regulators. In this analysis, we reconstruct the Capital One hierarchical cyber safety control structure, identify what parts failed and why, and provide recommendations for improvements. This work demonstrates how to discover the true causes of security failures in complex information systems and derive systematic cybersecurity improvements that likely apply to many other organizations. It also provides an approach that individuals can use to evaluate and better secure their organizations.
papers.abstract_zh: 2019年Capital One数据泄露是影响超过1亿人个人信息隐私和安全的最大数据泄露事件之一。在大多数关于网络攻击的报道中，你经常会听说，它之所以成功，是因为一名员工点击了网络钓鱼电子邮件中的一个链接，或者忘记了修补一些软件，使它看起来像是一个孤立的、一次性的、微不足道的问题，可能涉及一个人，犯了一个错误或疏忽。但这通常不是完整的故事。通过忽视相关的管理和组织失败，你正在为下一次违规留下条件。使用我们的网络安全分析方法，我们发现了跨控制级别的控制故障，从技术性问题一直到最高管理层、董事会和政府监管机构。在此分析中，我们重新构建了Capital One分层网络安全控制结构，确定了哪些部分出现故障及其原因，并提供了改进建议。这项工作展示了如何发现复杂信息系统中安全失败的真正原因，并得出可能适用于许多其他组织的系统化网络安全改进。它还提供了一种方法，个人可以使用它来评估和更好地保护他们的组织。
papers.title_zh: Capital One数据泄露的系统分析:关键经验教训

papers.title: Industrial Control Systems Security via Runtime Enforcement
papers.authors: Ruggero Lanotte, Massimo Merro, Andrei Munteanu
papers.abstract: With the advent of Industry 4.0, industrial facilities and critical infrastructures are transforming into an ecosystem of heterogeneous physical and cyber components, such as programmable logic controllers, increasingly interconnected and therefore exposed to cyber-physical attacks, i.e., security breaches in cyberspace that may adversely affect the physical processes underlying industrial control systems. In this article, we propose a formal approach based on runtime enforcement to ensure specification compliance in networks of controllers, possibly compromised by colluding malware that may locally tamper with actuator commands, sensor readings, and inter-controller communications. Our approach relies on an ad-hoc sub-class of Ligatti et al.’s edit automata to enforce controllers represented in Hennessy and Regan’s Timed Process Language. We define a synthesis algorithm that, given an alphabet 𝒫 of observable actions and a timed correctness property e, returns a monitor that enforces the property e during the execution of any (potentially corrupted) controller with alphabet 𝒫, and complying with the property e. Our monitors do mitigation by correcting and suppressing incorrect actions of corrupted controllers and by generating actions in full autonomy when the controller under scrutiny is not able to do so in a correct manner. Besides classical requirements, such as transparency and soundness, the proposed enforcement enjoys deadlock- and diverge-freedom of monitored controllers, together with scalability when dealing with networks of controllers. Finally, we test the proposed enforcement mechanism on a non-trivial case study, taken from the context of industrial water treatment systems, in which the controllers are injected with different malware with different malicious goals.
